rule: The output must only contain the part of speech tag.
input: She found a beautiful flower in the garden., flower
evaluation:
The output "NN" represents one of the part-of-speech tags listed in the description, specifically for a noun (singular or mass). The description doesn't necessitate knowledge of whether this tag is correctly applied to the word since we're not provided the input sentence or word. It only requires that the output be a valid part-of-speech tag or one of "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" if tagging is not possible. Since "NN" is indeed a valid part-of-speech tag as per the description, the output adheres to the given rules.

OK
